View on GitHub

Rooster

Rooster is a Kotlin-Paper Framework designed to take care of every step in Plugin Managment. Project yet in development Phase.

Information: This is mostly for myself but i thought i’d might also share, so if you don’t understand stuff: sorry lol ^^’
